content: to the end of the longest toes all are us sizes women s shoe sizes 4-6 5 8 9 20 23 cm women s shoe sizes 7-9 5 9 25 10 23 25 5 cm women s shoe sizes 10-12 5 10 25 11 26 28 cm men s shoe sizes 6-8 5 9 25 10 23 25 5 cm men s shoe sizes 9-11 5 10 25 11 26 28 cm men s shoe sizes 12-14 11 25 12 28 5 30 5 cm toe change to cc3 instructions for a basic rounded toe are below round 1 knit all sts round 2 k to 3 sts before instep k2tog k1 k1 ssk knit across instep sts until you have 3 sts remaining k2tog k1 k1 ssk k until end of round repeat last 2 rounds a total of 8 times then repeat round two until 16 total sts remain finishing using kitchener stitch graft the stitches together to close the toe weave in all ends 4 the lea socks knitting pattern by deb buckingham @knit on designs llc hey friend i m so glad you decided to purchase this pattern you won t be sorry i know there are so many free patterns out there and you chose to buy this one for that i m grateful i care about your experience and want you to know that i take time to make sure the details are accurate if you have any questions please don t hesitate to reach out email kodpatternhelp@gmail com hugs shop patterns etsy shop patterns ravelry shop patterns lovecrafts follow me on instagram knit on designs follow me on facebook knit on designs follow me on pinterest where i share my favorite recipes fun craft projects favorite home décor pins and more read about all the things i love tutorials and more on my blog 5 the lea socks knitting pattern by deb buckingham @knit on designs llc
